title: Sentimental Letter
original_name: センチメンタルレター
sinopse:
It's been three years since Amo's first love passed away. But they still have the feeling that everything that happened was a dream, even more when a transfer student with the same name and very similar to him suddenly arrives in his class. Who is he exactly? Can she put aside her first love to experience a new one?

Included one-shot: Kare Kano Continue
